body: $PQEFF Here is my opinion:It‚Äôs always darkest before the dawn. Try to ignore the noise and negativity until mid January. If someone was trying to bring the price down and create fear and panic selling they are succeeding right now
created_at: we know the Haywood report is coming and we know that the board recommendation is coming after that (which may be the board saying to accept the offer). Tendering now does not help anything but if you feel you want to tender then by all means go ahead but it will not prevent Viston from pulling the offer if that is what they want to do
column3: they could have 90% of shares tendered in January and still pull the offer
column4: people are grasping at ways to gain control of a situation that is beyond our control and if tendering prevents you from selling your shares at under 20 cents then tendering is way better than not tendering in my opinion
column5: but if you can wait it out until after the Haywood report at least you will have more information to make your decision.

body: $PQEFF Why the *uck is this thing bleeding out with an offer on the table.  Should have stabilized over .20 and slowly crept UPWARDS if anything.  More *ucking garbage.

$PQEFF   PQEMillions wrote: "I wouldn't feel sad at all if they withdrew the offer tomorrow because I didn't buy one of my 1.2 million shares AFTER the offer was made."    I'm not buying that.  Here is why - simple money math.   Let's estimate that you bought at about $0.05/share so the buyout would give you 10x payoff in two months - 10x (900%) payoffs are rare!   You could take that profit and invest in other hopefully profitable companies.   If the offer is pulled
created_at: the SP would sink to probably under $0.10/share and for PQEFF to make you "super rich"  you are going to bide your time for PQEFF to build numerous plants.   I don't think there will be one fully operational 5K or 10K barrels/day plant running by the end of next year so your 'super rich' payoff will be a couple if not several years down the road.   A bird in the hand... make that 10 birds in the hand in 2 months vs an unknown number of years in the bush.   You should be on your knees praying for the sale to go through.
